officialTitle: Effectiveness of Self-cross-linked Hyaluronic Acid Gel in the Prevention of Intrauterine Adhesions After Second Trimester Abortion
inclusionCriteria:
* Subject has curettage for retained product after second trimester abortion
* Must be FEMALE
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 39 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* History of curettage or other intrauterine surgery
* History of post-abortion complication or infection
